scripts.shadow-watch: npx shadow-cljs watch app browser-test karma-test
scripts.watch: npm run shadow-watch & npm run tailwind-watch
scripts.repl: echo "Enter the CLJS repl with (require 'dev.repl) (dev.repl/init)"; clojure -M:nrebel --port `cat .shadow-cljs/nrepl.port`
scripts.test:browser:start: python3 -m http.server 8290 --directory target/browser-test &echo $! > .test-server.pid && sleep 1 && echo 'Tests running at http://localhost:8290/index.html' && open http://localhost:8290/index.html
scripts.test:karma: npx shadow-cljs compile karma-test && npx karma start --single-run
scripts.release: npm run tailwind-release & npm run app-release
scripts.build-report: npx shadow-cljs run shadow.cljs.build-report app target/build-report.html
